verses.verse: The <S%H4633>preparations<s%> of the <S%H3820>heart<s%> in <S%H120>man<s%>, and the <S%H4617>answer<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue<s%>, is from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. preparations: or, disposings
All the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> are <S%H2134>clean<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8505>weigheth<s%> the <S%H7307>spirits<s%>.
<S%H1556>Commit<s%> thy <S%H4639>works<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and thy <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%>. Commit: Heb. Roll
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6466>made<s%> all things for <S%H4617>himself<s%>: yea, even the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

Every one that is <S%H1362>proud<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: though <S%H3027>hand<s%> join in <S%H3027>hand<s%>, he shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>. unpunished: Heb. held innocent
By <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is <S%H3722>purged<s%>: and by the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> men <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
When a <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H7521>please<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, he maketh even his <S%H341>enemies<s%> to be at <S%H7999>peace<s%> with him.
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is a <S%H4592>little<s%> with <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> than <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H8393>revenues<s%> without <S%H4941>right<s%>.
A <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2803>deviseth<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>: but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3559>directeth<s%> his <S%H6806>steps<s%>.
A divine <S%H7081>sentence<s%> is in the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>: his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H4603>transgresseth<s%> not in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>. A divine: Heb. Divination

A <S%H4941>just<s%> <S%H6425>weight<s%> and <S%H3976>balance<s%> are the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%>: all the <S%H68>weights<s%> of the <S%H3599>bag<s%> are his <S%H4639>work<s%>. the weights: Heb. the stones
It is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H4428>kings<s%> to <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>: for the <S%H3678>throne<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
<S%H6664>Righteous<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> are the <S%H7522>delight<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%>; and they <S%H157>love<s%> him that <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H3477>right<s%>.
The <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is as <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>: but a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H3722>pacify<s%> it.
In the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6440>countenance<s%> is <S%H2416>life<s%>; and his <S%H7522>favour<s%> is as a <S%H5645>cloud<s%> of the latter <S%H4456>rain<s%>.

How much <S%H2896>better<s%> is it to <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> than <S%H2742>gold<s%>! and to <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> rather to be <S%H977>chosen<s%> than <S%H3701>silver<s%>!
The <S%H4546>highway<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> is to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>: he that <S%H5341>keepeth<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8104>preserveth<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
<S%H1347>Pride<s%> goeth <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7667>destruction<s%>, and an <S%H1363>haughty<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> a <S%H3783>fall<s%>.

<S%H2896>Better<s%> it is to be of an <S%H8217>humble<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> with the <S%H6035>lowly<s%> <S%H6041><s%>, than to <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> with the <S%H1343>proud<s%>.

He that handleth a <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H7919>wisely<s%> shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>: and whoso <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H835>happy<s%> is he. handleth: or, understandeth a matter
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H995>prudent<s%>: and the <S%H4986>sweetness<s%> of the <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H3254>increaseth<s%> <S%H3948>learning<s%>.
<S%H7922>Understanding<s%> is a <S%H4726>wellspring<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> unto him that <S%H1167>hath<s%> it: but the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of <S%H191>fools<s%> is <S%H200>folly<s%>.
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H7919>teacheth<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H3254>addeth<s%> <S%H3948>learning<s%> to his <S%H8193>lips<s%>. teacheth: Heb. maketh wise
<S%H5278>Pleasant<s%> <S%H561>words<s%> are as an <S%H6688>honeycomb<s%> <S%H1706><s%>, <S%H4966>sweet<s%> to the <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H4832>health<s%> to the <S%H6106>bones<s%>.
There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> that seemeth <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H6440>unto<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>, but the <S%H319>end<s%> thereof are the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.
<S%H5315>He<s%> that <S%H6001>laboureth<s%> <S%H5998>laboureth<s%> for himself; for his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H404>craveth<s%> it of him. He: Heb. The soul of him that craveth: Heb. boweth unto him
An <S%H1100>ungodly<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> diggeth <S%H3738>up<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>: and in his <S%H8193>lips<s%> there is as a <S%H6867>burning<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>. An: Heb. A man of Belial
A <S%H8419>froward<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7971>soweth<s%> <S%H4066>strife<s%>: and a <S%H5372>whisperer<s%> <S%H6504>separateth<s%> chief <S%H441>friends<s%>. soweth: Heb. sendeth forth
A <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6601>enticeth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>, and <S%H3212>leadeth<s%> him into the <S%H1870>way<s%> that is not <S%H2896>good<s%>.

He <S%H6095>shutteth<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H2803>devise<s%> froward <S%H8419>things<s%>: <S%H7169>moving<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> he <S%H3615>bringeth<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> to <S%H3615>pass<s%>.
The hoary <S%H7872>head<s%> is a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>glory<s%>, if it be <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

He that is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>; and he that <S%H4910>ruleth<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> than he that <S%H3920>taketh<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%>.
The <S%H1486>lot<s%> is <S%H2904>cast<s%> into the <S%H2436>lap<s%>; but the whole <S%H4941>disposing<s%> thereof is of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
